department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: Renewal of juice and coffee supply contract
description: Renewal of a one-year Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) contract for the supply of juice concentrate, ground coffee, coffee liquid products and the installation, maintenance, and removal of dispensing units for a period of one year, with two option periods of one year each.
full_summary:
# Request for Standing Offer (RFISO) for Juice and Coffee with Dispensers

**Reference Number:** WS3766043317-Doc3766049697

**RFISO Solicitation Number:** WS3766043317

**Publication Date:** December 22, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** January 25, 2023, 14:00 EST

**Contracting Entity:**

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

**End User:** Department of National Defence (DND)

* Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada

**Request Overview:**
The Department of National Defence, CFB Edmonton, Alberta, is seeking bids for a one-year Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) with two one-year option periods for the supply, delivery, and offloading of juice concentrate, ground coffee, and coffee liquid products.

**Scope of Work:**

* Supply, delivery, and offloading of juice concentrate, ground coffee, and coffee liquid products
* Installation, maintenance, and removal of applicable dispensing units

**Pricing and Evaluation Criteria:**

* Lowest price will be the sole criterion for selection

**Commercial Trade Agreements:**
This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

**Tender Submission:**
Bid submission must be received by January 25, 2023, 14:00 EST. Late bids will not be accepted.

**Contact Information:**
Fatima Vallee, SPAC/PSPC, fatima.vallee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

You can review the tender announcement on the Buyandsell website.

Note: The rewritten entry includes only relevant information and is formatted for better readability using markdown format.
